faqs.question: What is the minimum investment amount?
faqs.answer: The minimum investment amount varies by farm and package, typically starting from â‚¹2,50,000 for a 1-acre plot. We offer flexible payment plans to suit different budgets.

faqs.question: What returns can I expect from farmland investment?
faqs.answer: Our investors typically see annual returns between 20-25%, depending on the crop type, market conditions, and farm location. We provide detailed projections for each investment opportunity.

faqs.question: How often will I receive updates about my farm?
faqs.answer: We provide regular updates through our digital platform, including monthly progress reports, quarterly financial statements, and real-time photos from your farm.

faqs.question: Can I visit my farm?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! We encourage investors to visit their farms. We organize quarterly farm visits and can arrange individual visits with prior notice.

faqs.question: What happens if there's a crop failure?
faqs.answer: We have comprehensive risk management strategies including crop insurance, diversified cropping patterns, and contingency funds to protect investor interests.

faqs.question: How is the land ownership structured?
faqs.answer: Investors receive clear title documents and legal ownership of their allocated farmland. All transactions are transparent and legally compliant.

faqs.question: What support do you provide for farm management?
faqs.answer: We provide complete farm management services including crop planning, cultivation, harvesting, marketing, and financial reporting. You don't need any farming experience.

faqs.question: Are there any hidden costs?
faqs.answer: No, we believe in complete transparency. All costs including management fees, maintenance charges, and operational expenses are clearly outlined in your investment agreement.
